item.title: Doctors without binders - data science consulting as an Insight Fellow
item.description: Physicians are overburdened by their binders full of paperwork. Consequently, doctors are often staring at their computer screen instead of interacting with their patient. In fact, the burden is so great that a new profession - medical scribe - has emerged. Medical scribes accompany physicians and manually transcribe their conversations and enter annotated notes into the electronic medical record.
